div.div: Mount St. Joseph vs. Thomas More
at Crestview Hills, Ky. | The Bank of Kentucky

tr.td: TMC wins toss and will defer. MSJ will receive and defer east goal.
Trevor Black kickoff 65 yards to the MSJ0, touchback.
Clay, James rush for 2 yards to the MSJ27 (Mitch McDowell;Kenny Veal).
Clay, James rush for loss of 2 yards to the MSJ25 (Nick Gramke).
PENALTY MSJ personal foul (Klekotka, Mike) 12 yards to the MSJ13.
PENALTY MSJ delay of game 5 yards to the MSJ8.
Pitzer, Brian pass incomplete to Peters, John.
